title: iPad app logo font identification required!
content:
Hey all,

Can anyone tell me what font is used in this logo for the word Laptimizer?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131218104310im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Laptimizer_logo_madeforipad_sticker_5210.png)

[http://laptimizer.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/Laptimizer\_logo2-1024x1...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131218104310/http:/laptimizer.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/Laptimizer_logo2-1024x145.png "http://laptimizer.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/Laptimizer\_logo2-1024x145.png")

Thanks,  
Cammer
author: Cammer66
